Subject: RE: LACOSTE Palm Jumeirah Mall - Store opening 3rd Sep 2025

 

Dear Team,

 

Thank you so much for joining the call today!

 

As discussed, LACOSTE PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

As a recap of the call please be informed that.

 

*	TL is available expiry date will be on 25th Sep and renewal planned next month in Aug - 24/7 Hassantak and AMC Certificate are available.
*	@Raul Bautista <mailto:Raul.Bautista@3d-consultants.com>  please share all documents with GA to apply for DCD Safety Certificate.
*	@Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  All IT Equipment are installed, pending is the ADSL Line to be finalized.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  to update us regarding the challenge of Etisalat connection by coming Monday 7th Jul.
*	@Mohamad Ali <mailto:Mohamed.Ali@chalhoub.com>   SR request was raised to MDM team and Items are ranged and created in the system.
*	@Mohamad Ali <mailto:Mohamed.Ali@chalhoub.com>  please to share list of few random items with Rizaldy to check and confirm if it’s reflecting correctly in the system.
*	@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>  to raise request for Kronos and Fareye and Muse activation.

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE

Thank you so much for joining the call today!

Dear Team,

 

Thank you so much for joining the call today!

 

As discussed, LACOSTE PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

As a recap of the call please be informed that.

 

*	TL is available expiry date will be on 25th Sep and renewal planned next month in Aug - 24/7 Hassantak and AMC Certificate are available.
*	@Raul Bautista <mailto:Raul.Bautista@3d-consultants.com>  please share all documents with GA to apply for DCD Safety Certificate.
*	@Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com>  All IT Equipment are installed, pending is the ADSL Line to be finalized.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  to update us regarding the challenge of Etisalat connection by coming Monday 7th Jul.
*	@Mohamad Ali <mailto:Mohamed.Ali@chalhoub.com>   SR request was raised to MDM team and Items are ranged and created in the system.
*	@Mohamad Ali <mailto:Mohamed.Ali@chalhoub.com>  please to share list of few random items with Rizaldy to check and confirm if it’s reflecting correctly in the system.
*	@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>  to raise request for Kronos and Fareye and Muse activation.

Dear Team,

 

Thank you so much for joining the call today!

 

As discussed, LACOSTE PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

As a recap of the call please be informed that.

 

*	TL is available expiry date will be on 25th Sep and renewal planned next month in Aug - 24/7 Hassantak and AMC Certificate are available.

*	@Mohamad Ali <mailto:Mohamed.Ali@chalhoub.com>  please to share list of few random items with Rizaldy to check and confirm if it’s reflecting correctly in the system.
*	@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>  to raise request for Kronos and Fareye and Muse activation.

Dear All,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that LACOSTE PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation link will be sent to all stakeholders to discuss about the opening preparations and the assigned tasks. Please ensure your attendance!

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out RSO / Alof Joseph; 055 633 5262 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE

Subject: LACOSTE Palm Jumeirah Mall - Store opening 3rd Sep 2025
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

Please be informed that LACOSTE PALM JUMEIRAH MALL handover date to the mall will be on 30th July 2025, and the operating date is planned on 3rd September 2025.

 

We have prepared the store opening checklist for this store to ensure the timely completion of all tasks. Kindly go through it and take necessary action to complete it on-time. 

 

A Microsoft meeting invitation link will be sent to all stakeholders to discuss about the opening preparations and the assigned tasks. Please ensure your attendance!

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach out RSO / Alof Joseph; 055 633 5262 any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE
